member.name: T:BookPubDB.Model.Artist
member.summary: Represents an artist who contributes to book covers.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Artist.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the unique identifier for the artist.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Artist.FirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the first name of the artist.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Artist.LastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the last name of the artist.

member.name: P:BookPubDB.Model.Artist.Covers
member.summary: Gets or sets the list of covers the artist has contributed to.
